channel.title: 562 jail system and help system
channel.description:
I have all the locations i want for my jail and help system.
I need to just have simple jail command for these coords "2734 3466 0" And I need a command for if a player needs help they type ::help and it teles them to " 2734 3469 0" but it also has a server wide message saying "(player name) needs assistance" Then a admin or mod can type "gohelp" and it teles them to " 2732 3469 0" and has a server message saying "(player name) is on their way" Can some one do this i know its alot to ask but i have no clue how to :( Thanks

item.title: 562 jail system and help system
